text: Marian Ionuț Marin (born 11 September 1987) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a central defender for Ozana Târgu Neamț in the Liga III.CSM Ceahlăul a mai perfectat două partide amicale. Vezi numele adversarilor și datele de disputare a celor două jocuri. Ionuț Covasan și Marius Banga sunt numele altor 2 jucători aflați în probe. danesanu.blogspot.com In his career Marin also played for teams such as: CSM Roman, Dunărea Galați, Petrolul Ploiești, FC Brașov or Academica Clinceni, among others. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FCM Dunărea Galați players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:CS Concordia Chiajna players Category:SR Brașov players Category:FC Academica Clinceni players
title: Marian Marin
